CodeList.Name: Musculoskeletal System Finding Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: A terminology codelist to describe the test code for a physiological examination of the musculoskeletal system.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The extent of a 2-dimensional surface enclosed within a boundary. (NCI)
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Area

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: An assessment of the quantity of minerals within a specific bone(s) or segments.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Bone Mineral Content

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: A measurement of the amount of minerals contained in a specified volume or area of bone(s) or segments.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Bone Mineral Density Test

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The standard deviation of the subject's bone mineral density score in comparison to the normal bone mineral density of a healthy 30-year old adult.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Bone Mineral Density T-Score

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: A statistical score representing the number of standard deviations above or below what is expected for an individual's bone mineral density based on his age, sex, weight, and race.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Bone Mineral Density Z-Score

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Brooke Modified Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Abduction
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The numerical value that represents the result of a clinical assessment of muscle strength and function during abduction that is based on the Brooke Modified Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test. (Brooke MH, Griggs RC, Mendell JR, Fenichel GM, et al. Clinical trial in Duchenne dystrophy. I. The design of the protocol. Muscle Nerve. 1981 May-Jun;4(3):186-97. doi:10.1002/mus.880040304).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Brooke Modified Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Abduction

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Brooke Modified Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Dorsiflexion
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The numerical value that represents the result of a clinical assessment of muscle strength and function during dorsiflexion that is based on the Brooke Modified Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test. (Brooke MH, Griggs RC, Mendell JR, Fenichel GM, et al. Clinical trial in Duchenne dystrophy. I. The design of the protocol. Muscle Nerve. 1981 May-Jun;4(3):186-97. doi:10.1002/mus.880040304).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Brooke Modified Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Dorsiflexion

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Brooke Modified Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Eversion
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The numerical value that represents the result of a clinical assessment of muscle strength and function during eversion that is based on the Brooke Modified Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test. (Brooke MH, Griggs RC, Mendell JR, Fenichel GM, et al. Clinical trial in Duchenne dystrophy. I. The design of the protocol. Muscle Nerve. 1981 May-Jun;4(3):186-97. doi:10.1002/mus.880040304).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Brooke Modified Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Eversion

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Brooke Modified Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Extension
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The numerical value that represents the result of a clinical assessment of muscle strength and function during extension that is based on the Brooke Modified Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test. (Brooke MH, Griggs RC, Mendell JR, Fenichel GM, et al. Clinical trial in Duchenne dystrophy. I. The design of the protocol. Muscle Nerve. 1981 May-Jun;4(3):186-97. doi:10.1002/mus.880040304).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Brooke Modified Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Extension

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Brooke Modified Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Flexion
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The numerical value that represents the result of a clinical assessment of muscle strength and function during flexion that is based on the Brooke Modified Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test. (Brooke MH, Griggs RC, Mendell JR, Fenichel GM, et al. Clinical trial in Duchenne dystrophy. I. The design of the protocol. Muscle Nerve. 1981 May-Jun;4(3):186-97. doi:10.1002/mus.880040304).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Brooke Modified Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Flexion

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Brooke Modified Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Inversion
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The numerical value that represents the result of a clinical assessment of muscle strength and function during inversion that is based on the Brooke Modified Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test. (Brooke MH, Griggs RC, Mendell JR, Fenichel GM, et al. Clinical trial in Duchenne dystrophy. I. The design of the protocol. Muscle Nerve. 1981 May-Jun;4(3):186-97. doi:10.1002/mus.880040304).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Brooke Modified Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Inversion

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Brooke Modified Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Lateral Rotation
Brooke mMRC MMT Score, Lat. Rotat.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The numerical value that represents the result of a clinical assessment of muscle strength and function during lateral rotation that is based on the Brooke Modified Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test. (Brooke MH, Griggs RC, Mendell JR, Fenichel GM, et al. Clinical trial in Duchenne dystrophy. I. The design of the protocol. Muscle Nerve. 1981 May-Jun;4(3):186-97. doi:10.1002/mus.880040304).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Brooke Modified Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Lateral Rotation

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Brooke Modified Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Plantar Flexion
Brooke mMRC MMT Score, Plantar Flex
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The numerical value that represents the result of a clinical assessment of muscle strength and function during plantar flexion that is based on the Brooke Modified Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test. (Brooke MH, Griggs RC, Mendell JR, Fenichel GM, et al. Clinical trial in Duchenne dystrophy. I. The design of the protocol. Muscle Nerve. 1981 May-Jun;4(3):186-97. doi:10.1002/mus.880040304).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Brooke Modified Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Plantar Flexion

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The amount of an individual's total body mass that is fat, expressed as a percent.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Body Fat Percentage

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: An assessment of muscle strength that measures that force with which one holds or grasps.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Grip Strength

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: An assessment of muscle strength that measures the force produced by static muscle contraction during the straightening (unbending) movement between body parts. (NCI)
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Isometric Muscle Strength, Extension

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: An assessment of muscle strength that measures the force produced by static muscle contraction during the bending movement between body parts. (NCI)
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Isometric Muscle Strength, Flexion

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Lean Body Mass to Total Body Mass Ratio
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The proportion of an individual's lean body mass to his total body weight. Lean body mass is calculated by subtracting body fat from total body weight.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Lean Body Mass to Total Body Mass Ratio

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Abduction
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The numerical value that represents the result of a clinical assessment of muscle strength and function during abduction that is based on the Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test. (Medical Research Council. Aids to examination of the peripheral nervous system. Memorandum no. 45, superseding War Memorandum No. 7. London: Her Majesty's Stationary Office; 1976. doi:10.1016/0022-510X(77)90205-2).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Abduction

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Dorsiflexion
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The numerical value that represents the result of a clinical assessment of muscle strength and function during dorsiflexion that is based on the Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test. (Medical Research Council. Aids to examination of the peripheral nervous system. Memorandum no. 45, superseding War Memorandum No. 7. London: Her Majesty's Stationary Office; 1976. doi:10.1016/0022-510X(77)90205-2).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Dorsiflexion

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Eversion
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The numerical value that represents the result of a clinical assessment of muscle strength and function during eversion that is based on the Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test. (Medical Research Council. Aids to examination of the peripheral nervous system. Memorandum no. 45, superseding War Memorandum No. 7. London: Her Majesty's Stationary Office; 1976. doi:10.1016/0022-510X(77)90205-2).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Eversion

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Extension
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The numerical value that represents the result of a clinical assessment of muscle strength and function during extension that is based on the Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test. (Medical Research Council. Aids to examination of the peripheral nervous system. Memorandum no. 45, superseding War Memorandum No. 7. London: Her Majesty's Stationary Office; 1976. doi:10.1016/0022-510X(77)90205-2).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Extension

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Flexion
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The numerical value that represents the result of a clinical assessment of muscle strength and function during flexion that is based on the Medical Research Council Manual Muscle. (Medical Research Council. Aids to examination of the peripheral nervous system. Memorandum no. 45, superseding War Memorandum No. 7. London: Her Majesty's Stationary Office; 1976. doi:10.1016/0022-510X(77)90205-2).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Flexion

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Inversion
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The numerical value that represents the result of a clinical assessment of muscle strength and function during inversion that is based on the Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test. (Medical Research Council. Aids to examination of the peripheral nervous system. Memorandum no. 45, superseding War Memorandum No. 7. London: Her Majesty's Stationary Office; 1976. doi:10.1016/0022-510X(77)90205-2).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Inversion

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Lateral Rotation
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The numerical value that represents the result of a clinical assessment of muscle strength and function during lateral rotation that is based on the Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test. (Medical Research Council. Aids to examination of the peripheral nervous system. Memorandum no. 45, superseding War Memorandum No. 7. London: Her Majesty's Stationary Office; 1976. doi:10.1016/0022-510X(77)90205-2).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Lateral Rotation

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Plantar Flexion
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The numerical value that represents the result of a clinical assessment of muscle strength and function during plantar flexion that is based on the Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test. (Medical Research Council. Aids to examination of the peripheral nervous system. Memorandum no. 45, superseding War Memorandum No. 7. London: Her Majesty's Stationary Office; 1976. doi:10.1016/0022-510X(77)90205-2).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Medical Research Council Manual Muscle Test Score, Plantar Flexion

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: An assessment of hand muscle strength that measures the force with which an individual can squeeze or compress an object using his thumb and one or multiple fingers from the same hand.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Pinch Strength

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: An assessment of joint flexibility that measures the movement of a body part pulling away from the midline of the body, in number of degrees. (NCI)
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Range of Motion, Abduction

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: An assessment of joint flexibility that measures the movement of a body part bending towards its dorsal surface, in number of degrees. (NCI)
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Range of Motion, Dorsiflexion

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: An assessment of joint flexibility that measures the straightening (unbending) movement between body parts, in number of degrees. (NCI)
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Range of Motion, Extension

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The numerical value that represents the result of a clinical assessment of bone erosion based on the Genant modification of the Sharp Joint Erosion Assessment (Genant HK. Methods of assessing radiographic change in rheumatoid arthritis. Am J Med. 1983 Dec 30;75(6A):35-47).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Sharp Genant Bone Erosion Score

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The numerical value that represents the result of a clinical assessment of joint space narrowing based on the Genant modification of the Sharp Joint Space Narrowing Assessment (Genant HK. Methods of assessing radiographic change in rheumatoid arthritis. Am J Med. 1983 Dec 30;75(6A):35-47).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Sharp Genant Joint Space Narrowing Score

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Sharp/Van der Heijde Bone Erosion Score
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The numerical value that represents the result of a clinical assessment of bone erosion based on the Van der Heijde modification of the Sharp Joint Erosion Assessment (Van der Heijde DM, van Riel PL, Nuver-Zwart IH, Gribnau FW, van de Putte LB. Effects of hydroxychloroquine and sulphasalazine on progression of joint damage in rheumatoid arthritis. Lancet 1989;1:1036-8).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Sharp van der Heijde Bone Erosion Score

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The numerical value that represents the result of a clinical assessment of joint space narrowing based on the Van der Heijde modification of the Sharp Joint Space Narrowing Assessment (Van der Heijde DM, van Riel PL, Nuver-Zwart IH, Gribnau FW, van de Putte LB. Effects of hydroxychloroquine and sulphasalazine on progression of joint damage in rheumatoid arthritis. Lancet 1989;1:1036-8).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Sharp van der Heijde Joint Space Narrowing Score

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: An indication as to whether there are symptoms of swelling.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Swollen Indicator

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: An indication as to whether there are symptoms of tenderness.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Tenderness Indicator

CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Musculoskeletal System Finding Test Code Terminology
